original: Egnell, Per Bertil William, direktör, v. konsul, Marstrand, f. 12/12/78 i Marstrand av apot. Axel E. o. Bertha Widegren. G. 06 m. Märta Presto, d. 39. Barn: Olle f. 07, Lisa 11, Axel 12, Britta o. Karin 16. — Dir. f. A-B Marstrands Mek. Verkst. sed. bild. 04, f. Marstrands Nya Angf. A-B sed. 17 o. f. Marstrands Turisthotell A-B sed. 25. Danm. v. konsul i Marstrand sed. 30. Ordf. i stadsfullm. 24-41. Hob-bies: jakt, fiske, segling. RDDO.
translated: Egnell, Per Bertil William, director, vice-consul, Marstrand, born on December 12, 1878 in Marstrand to pharmacist Axel E. and Bertha Widegren. Married in 1906 to Märta Presto, who died in 1939. Children: Olle born in 1907, Lisa in 1911, Axel in 1912, Britta and Karin in 1916. He became a director of A-B Marstrands Mek. Verkst. in 1904, founded Marstrands Nya Angf. A-B in 1917 and Marstrands Turisthotell A-B in 1925. He became vice-consul of Denmark in Marstrand in 1930. He was chairman of the city council from 1924-1941. His hobbies were hunting, fishing, and sailing. He was awarded the Knight of the Royal Order of Vasa.

structured.name: Per Bertil William Egnell
structured.honorificSuffix: of the Royal Order of Vasa
